title: Subway Playground
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Benton Murdoch Spruance [1904-1967], Philadelphia, PA; Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1951.

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Beal purchased two impressions of the lithograph for $45 each (see invoice from Mr. Spruance, dated December 1, 1951, with acknowledgement of payment on December 14, 1951.) One of the two appears on a list of works received at Carnegie Institute as possible gifts on October 25, 1951. The lithograph was accessioned by Carnegie Institute on November 1, 1951.
